Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lelion Way, south of the Holy Order of the Red Rose.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road is the Paladin's Holy Order of the Red Rose, where worthy paladins train. To the south is the large Wakarimasu Park, home of a number of old dieties from ancient times, no longer believed in. However, their presence is still felt within the park.
